website_summaries.verdict: This natural scrub is worth considering for consumers who prefer superior exfoliating action and super-cleansing ingredients.
pros: Made with natural Himalayan pink salt that's clarifying to the skin and suitable for treating blemishes and blackheads
Contains plant oils that are nourishing and cleansing
cons: Very abrasive, so it's not the best choice for sensitive or delicate skin

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I hope the short video shows just how soft and moisturizing it is! It is not something you would want to stop rubbing in your fingers. The scent is absolutely lovely, though I know that this is very subjective. I just did not really expect it to smell so good AT ALL! The bottle design and label didn't really appeal to me, I think they could work on that a little, but the product inside jumped right up to scrub number one in my book. So highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: XS

customer_reviews.title: Not an ordinary Scrub! You will really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be another regular, run-of-the-mill scrub, but how I was wrong! I have been using it on my face and neck every night for the past week and I was pleasantly surprised!! After the Scrub, the Lychee Oils nicely and richly moisturize the face, I do not even feel the need to put on my nightly moisturizer after using the Premium Himalayan Scrub. I have combination, menopausal facial skin, and this product is doing wonders clearing up topical imperfections and dryness. I love it and may be a lifetime customer. Thank you so much for this product M3 Naturals!
customer_reviews.author: S. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Felt results after first use!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product but decided to purchase it due to all the good reviews--so glad that I did. My skin has been feeling particularly dry since giving birth to my son, so I was looking to change my facial regimen to rehydrate my skin. After my first use I could feel the change immediately. My skin felt smoother and much more refreshed I felt like the salts really helped my moisturizer absorb more efficiently and effectively. I think it will only get better. Definitely a smart purchase!
customer_reviews.author: salade122

customer_reviews.title: I have used water and it works just fine and is still moisturizing on the skin
customer_reviews.text: This is just a salt scrub. It is moisturizing and will leave your skin soft. However, there is no liquid inside. You will have to mix either with water or your own oil. I have used water and it works just fine and is still moisturizing on the skin. Be careful if you have any kind of razor burn or cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. This product caused my skin to darken and I could not figure out for the longest time why my skin was getting worse until I threw it away and 2 weeks later from doing my regular routine minus this product my skin had already brightened. This product only has good reviews because they promise people a free product. Do not waste your time and buy this, it will ruin your skin. This is not a real scrub and will damage your skin.
customer_reviews.author: lacy

customer_reviews.title: Great scrub for face and body!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great facial and body scrub! My whole family loves this and uses it quite often to clean off dead skin and impurities. I really do enjoy this scrub because it is strong enough to clean off dead skin however gentle enough to keep your skin soft and moisturized. That’s the thing about exfoliating, they make my skin dry but this one hydrates with all the almond oil! I use it about every other day or every 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Moniqueelamm

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product but decided to purchase it due to all the good reviews--so glad that I did. My skin has been feeling particularly dry since menopause. I was looking to change my regimen to rehydrate my skin. After my first use I could feel the change immediately. My skin felt smoother and much more refreshed I felt like the salts really helped my lotion absorb more effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great pre-shave scrub
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using this product as a face scrub before shaving as I have a tendency to get ingrown hairs. The moisturizer in the scrub is light enough to help protect my skin while shaving but not greasy. I sometimes lightly scrub after shaving as well as it helps to kill bacteria and works as an after-shave though, it can sting if you're not used to salt. I find though momentarily uncomfortable it stops irritation and reduces ingrown hair. I highly recommend it as it doesn't have perfumes which would only further irritate skin. It's great for the rest of the body too.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Okay product, promo a scam!
customer_reviews.text: Promo for free bottle a scam do not submit personal info. Product okay otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: When looking for scrubs through all of amazon's bajillion choices, I wasn't really sure for which to go for. I stumbled upon this one and after reading other people's positive reviews, I decided to add this to my cart. Been using it for about a month now and it's my favorite scrub. It smells nice and leaves the skin feeling soft afterwards. Doesn't remove all the blackheads but no product has ever done that for me, so I'd say this one did a good job at keep them at bay.
customer_reviews.author: jcm

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product! Had severe allergic reaction that lasted over a week - buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: When I got this product, it just looked like all the liquid had evaporated and it was a big can of hardened sea salt. the seal had not been broken, so I decided to try it anyways. Shortly after scrubbing it on, I developed red bumps all over the applied areas (hands, legs, arms) and it lasted almost 10 days! I had to apply cortisone creams and take benadryl to counteract the effects and I'm pregnant, so needless to say was a complete disaster. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very remarkable salt!
customer_reviews.text: This product exfoliates, leaves skin glowing and soft and appears to be minimizing my pores. I have not been so happy with a facial cleanser in ages.“Great service and happy with this new to me product. Am using on my face and really happy with the results. There is no visible oil; did the salt absorb it? Making a positive difference in my skin after just two days.”
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Foxtrot

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin soft and refreshed
customer_reviews.text: I recently started looking into body scrubs and exfoliating. Using this scrub has helped my dry and itchy legs (from shaving) immensely. There was another product that I had tried, and although it left my skin smooth, I felt that it had too much fragrance and oil. This is just perfect, I only wish it came in even a bigger size, because I find myself using it quite a bit. I was hoping this would help reduce the appearance of my "strawberry legs"... unfortunately it has not helped even with me switching to a epilator. :( If anyone has suggestions or found something that worked for strawberry legs, please do share! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: wouldnt purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help smooth skin and exfoliate cause its got the Himalayan salt... please tell me I am wrong for purchasing this for the wrong reason if I did... but the moment I rubbed it onto my skin... felt all my pores clogging and felt like I was dunked in oil. couldn't get this oily feeling out of my skin for a couple days.. I usually have dry skin, but this felt like I put old oil that's been sitting for day, all over my body DO NOT RECOMMEND BUYING THIS TO ANYONE
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and overpriced! It was caked and dried up and not easy to apply without it falling apart...BS about the Collagen and Stem Cell ect... just a simple salt scrub...OVERPRICED...DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth & James Stagge

customer_reviews.title: Received the package with the seal
customer_reviews.text: I received the product with the seal off and the jar half empty . In addition the top of the box was asking for my information In exchange for a free product which is Probably a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Muhamedagic

customer_reviews.title: Good product ive just bought 2 more
customer_reviews.text: Good product although you need to use a little more of it than some others ive tried, however the company itself is great ive tried the charcoal too and i much prefer the Premium Himalayan Scrub
customer_reviews.author: Ronni Ben-israel

customer_reviews.title: Good salt scrub for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this scrub, the salt isn't huge crystals, it's a fine grain scrub that doesn't cause issues with sensitive skin. I've used it on my elbows and my feet without any problems. The scent is subtle, almost citrus but it takes to essential oils really well if you want to add your own. I would recommend this if you're just getting started with salt scrubs since it's gentle and not as abrasive as some others.
customer_reviews.author: J adams

customer_reviews.title: Good reviews |  Not so good product
customer_reviews.text: This product has awesome reviews so of course it seemed very promising well, it wasn't. I was expecting it to leave my skin smooth and soft but I felt no difference. I decided to give it another try and nothing still; I have to say though, the smell of this scrub is very pleasant. I wanted to return this product but I used it twice already and I feel that really isn't fair returning something I already used in the shower lol. I do recommend purchasing Dove's exfoliate polish, it works wonders! My friend suggested I try it and it is wonderful. Plus, its only $6 vs paying $30 for this stuff. Hope this review helps!
customer_reviews.author: ceaira

customer_reviews.title: BEST BODY SCRUB EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My skin was feeling so dry over these past couple of weeks, I didn’t know what to do so I went on Amazon and read a couple reviews and said let me try this natural body scrub. I am so happy with my purchase I’m glad I try this, I use it every day after I apply my soap and it leaves my skin feeling so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled
customer_reviews.text: Man don't be fooled by these glowing reviews. They offer another free scrub if you give them a good review. I did a test run on my palm and it was fine and smooth, but when I did an all over test it cuts and burns my skin. And not a burn feeling where you know it's working burn but a burn that your like oh hell nah. I ended up returning the one I got for free too. The deception, lies, the reviews deceived me.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Francos

customer_reviews.title: Product works But
customer_reviews.text: After the application your skin feels totally renewed. As for the company and the way they lead you to believe they will give you a 2nd jar free this is a LIE. Flat out misrepresentation to get your information. I personally will NEVER buy another one of anything they sell. If I had an ability on here to post the top of the jar and they're responses after gathering all your personal information I bet you would not buy from them either.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Daury

customer_reviews.title: Use small amounts at a time.
customer_reviews.text: Not only did I receive a thank you note from this company just for my purchase but also a few little extra instructions to receive the best results when using the salt scrub. The salt itself is extremely fine and delightful in fragrance. After the use of it my legs, they looked amazing and felt like baby skin. The other plus was how soft they were just from using the salt on my legs. Not only are my legs and hands super soft but my lotion was able to absorb into my skin because the old top layer of dried cells was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Mj Ditt

customer_reviews.title: Quality scrub that smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It’s seriously amazing. I live in Arizona, and it’s starting to get reallyyy hot, like 90 a day. And so my skin is starting to get really dry! And it’s all about shorts now! But thanks to this scrub, it’s pretty much a non issue. It’s nice and thick and gritty, but it’s also hydrating. Since summer here lasts about 6 months, I’ll most likely be buying another bottle before summers over. I think I found my favorite scrub!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever!
customer_reviews.text: This product landed me in the hospital with hives all over my body. I literally only applied on my feet and broke out in hives all over my body. I'll never buy this thing ever again. People with sensitive skin beware. Sucks I wish I can get my money back but I'll never purchase ever again.
customer_reviews.author: GPJ

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin super soft!
customer_reviews.text: My skin never felt so soft and smooth before. Definitely recommending this product who has Keratosis Pilaris. It helped a lot and always moisturize after works amazing. I wish I found this earlier after so many different products treating me KP.
customer_reviews.author: Lowrhie

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I received this Sunday and it’s only Wednesday but it is amazing! I’ve noticed so much more softness in my skin. It exfoliates and does so much more. My skin has literally transformed in 4 days. I use it in the shower every morning and I mix it with my skin cleanser at night. I’m soft, and less oily and my breakouts are even going away. I love this! Will be ordering again and want to try the vitamin c serum next! LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Moisturizer...Glowing Skin
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a scrub that would get rid of my stretch marks, unfortunately this product didnt do the trick. Nevertheless, this salt scrub did rid of cellulite and kept my skin mosturized and glowing for the days to come. I am glad I invested in this product, I would recommend to anyone looking for a natural exfoliator.
customer_reviews.author: Afrikara

customer_reviews.title: Bad shelf life once opened
customer_reviews.text: Used this and worked great but after getting low I used it sparingly the last time I opened the jar it smelled like the oil that sat in the forgotten fryer for way to long. Yuck
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Puhl

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with my Himalayan Scrub!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub works extremely well! No lie I haven’t had one pimple since I’ve been scrubbing my face with this stuff. Your face feels extremely clean and smooth after use amd makes a perfect gift for anyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: My Wait is finally over❣️
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to remove or lessen some fine lines on my face and eyes. I am on my late 50s and finally found my perfect match. I have been using several beauty skin products but nothing can compare to M3 Himalayan salt. In 3 days you will begin to notice the difference. I found my skin glowing and shiny. Most of my fine lines disappear and the craws feet under my eyes almost gone. It really hits what i wanted to achieve, having a soft and youthful skin. And it is all natural no worries on probable breakouts. I am excited to have my second order delivered on my doorstep.
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and I haven’t used it yet, but it’s completely dried out and clumped together. I guess I’ll try to add water to see if it’s still usable at all. Disappointing so far though.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Beck

customer_reviews.title: Product was dry and fell apart
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughters birthday the product was dry and you could not use it just fell off your skin. Ordered a replacement one and it is the same way. Not sure if that is the way the product is designed but not what we expected will see if I can have her return this one too
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: This really does exfoliate.
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and I’m very rosacea prone during the winter. I tan occasionally to keep my skin in check but it also causes my face to dry out sometimes and dead skin will get into my pores. I use this once or twice a week and it makes your face so smooth and soft. I do have combination skin and it feels like my t zone is a little oily after using this but I wash with ivory bar of soap in the shower right after I exfoliate and it takes the extra oily ness right off and my face feels fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: SJ94

customer_reviews.title: The worst beauty product I have every used.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this product has so many good reviews. I felt I was rubbing sand on my face. It was so coarse. Not recommended. Please do not buy this product !
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: SOFT ROSES?!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product a couple of weeks now-- New to scrubs and exfoliants and was very excited to receive this product, as I have past experience with Himalayan salt for a different reason. I figured if the salt helped with pain let's try some scrub. I love this product! Kind of rough at first but when it dissolves just a little you get the sensation of fine particles being massaged over your body and leaves it oh so soft & I was shocked that it smells like roses!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Creamer

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation
customer_reviews.text: One the product came to my house it was already opened it was dried up and I'm not happycan tell that it was tooken off the shelf like that because it had no oil at all in it it was dried up it was still sealed on the outside in the clear cellophane but the top of it had been lifted under the lid
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Hughes Allen

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I tend to have dry skin and am always looking for something to help it out. I’ve used other scrubs and have found they usually dry my skin out more. I got this one hoping it would be different and it is. This scrub is awesome it doesn’t leave my skin dry feeling but leaves is nice and silky feeling. I also am addicted to the smell it’s so light and refreshing. I would recommend this to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and natural
customer_reviews.text: I've used the charcoal scrub version serval times before this. I will say this has a MUCH better smell and feel to it. It leaves my skin smooth but not dried out. I dont break out alot, but if I do its typically in small instances. However when I used this, I did break out in one spot and it has been a nuisance. I chalk that up to my skin needing to get used to the product. I will definitely use this again.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face and although it taste horrible if it gets in your mouth (ya know salt) it works wonders. I bought it since my face was dry and flaky and after one use the dryness is gone and my skin is so soft! Bonus my acne scars are starting to fade after a week and my breakouts are going away. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Jaide

customer_reviews.title: This scrub is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I found my bath scrub for life! The texture is great, it’s not to rough so it’s useable on your face but rough enough to get all that dry flaky skin off your body! The scent is very subtle and to me is smells like pink lemonade. I love it because it leaves a nice oil left behind after you rinse off but by the time your completely dry your skin doesn’t feel oily but just super soft! Use as a pre shave and not after because it does burn like hell on any kind of cuts or acne but doesn’t last long. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but not for very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: The seal was broken when I opened the cap which made me hesitant to try. But with the great reviews I went ahead and tried it anyway. My skin felt like it was on fire. It did smell good though. Not a good product for very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have read so many good reviews about this product and was excited to try it. Honestly for the price it is not worth it at all. It is no better than any other "scrub" that you can get for a quarter of the price. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and makes my skin super soft. I also tried it to massage on my thighs and it seems to increase blood flow and I see my cellulite is less visible.
customer_reviews.author: Katya

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT !!
customer_reviews.text: First and for most I’m a huge fan of scrubs , what intrigued me about this particular scrub is the key work “collagen and stem cells” we all know those key components play a big role in rejuvenating the skin . I love the consistency and the smell is amazing kind of smells like a grape fruit. Also I have very very sensitive skin and break out easily but using this product I haven’t had any issues !! Love love love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrisma Blyden

customer_reviews.title: To expensive not to work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few different salt scrubs in the past but this one was by far unfortunately this product wasn’t what I expected and the price didn’t help its to expensive. The product was dried out no moisture what so ever. The only upside about it is the smell. On the top of the container is a sticker stating that you get a free jar but never do
customer_reviews.author: 100%real

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am in my early 40's with sensitive, oily, and acne prone skin. I was a bit hesitant to buy this at first because it has oil in it, but after a week or two of using at least once per day, I am happy with the results. There's no skin irritation. The salt does a good job of exfoliating all the dead skin cells and the oil helps to moisturize after rinse. So far, I haven't broke out and in fact, my skin looks much smoother and softer. This is a good product, and no, I'm not getting paid to say this even though that'd be nice :)
customer_reviews.author: Maix

customer_reviews.title: Opened seal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and usually would complain but opened it up and the seal was almost completely off. Wondering now is it new or if it was opened prior. Or could have came unsealed due to travel. But I'm usually cautious when it comes to seals being opened. It looks awesome though .. may try a little bit to test.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do what I know scrubs to do
customer_reviews.text: This scent is pleasant but that’s about it...I have used in the shower and it didn’t seem to add any extra moisture to my skin or smoothed anything...have made my own at home that worked better but wanted to try something different
customer_reviews.author: Cadence

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scrub
customer_reviews.text: I had originally ordered this as a facial scrub. After reading reviews and actually trying it out myself. I use it all over. It softens my skin and smells so nice. It's not overpowering and the ingredients are simple. It cleared up my skin wonderfully. It works perfectly as a pre shave exfoliant. I would give five stars, but the price is a little steep. It's completely worth it though. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and moisturizes your skin but product is a bit abrasive
customer_reviews.text: This product does it job well but at what cost. It is very abrasive on your skin so use with caution. My wife complained about it being rough so I know it's not just me ,including previous reviews mentioning it. When i did use it i noticed it allowed my face to feel open-pored while feeling moisturized at the same time. I'm very picky about the products I use but I can stand by this one and say it has its uses maybe just not for daily facial use.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckj412

customer_reviews.title: All natural, beautiful scent & exfoliating himalayan scrub from head to toe!
customer_reviews.text: I love how big the product is and it will last a while. The scent is so nice and not overwhelming at all, it's a very pretty light natural scent and very moisturizing for your skin. You can use this on you face and body. It leaves you skin feeling super baby soft and fresh and smells amazing! Will be buying more once I run out of this product. Definitely 5 stars! I love this stuff and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marie

customer_reviews.title: Item came DRY! Don’t waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.text: This product came DRY! Like no oil, looked like half of the product had disappeared. For the price... this is unacceptable!! I immediately returned it! Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing . . .
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this makes my skin feel. It is salty and you feel quite refreshed after using it. I find that my skin is smoother and softer. Two thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Onyx girl

customer_reviews.title: This is just salt!
customer_reviews.text: Dont know what all the five star reviews are about. The product feels and looks like a dried up salt and doesnt feel good on the skin at all. such a waste!
customer_reviews.author: karthik

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing.
customer_reviews.text: I really don't get the hype about this product. It's actually not even that good. Not moisturizing and not exfoliating at all. Really dislike it. Get something cheaper in target or walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Marie T

customer_reviews.title: Had a bad reaction. Threw it out
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive dry skin and this made it worse. Even made me arms break out in hives. I was very gentle when using it but it was still very rough and made a small cut on my arm. My entire arms and chest where I used the scrub were constantly peeling. Once I stopped using it my hives went away and my arms and chest stopped peeling. Will not be using again.
customer_reviews.author: haley pitts

customer_reviews.title: No sealed all the way
customer_reviews.text: Came with a sketchy plastic over it and seal was open I haven no idea if the product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Too hyped
customer_reviews.text: Ive been searching for a hydrating scrub. I came across this on amazon. I was hesitant at first because of the price. But I decided to try it because I have tried so many other affordable hydrating products with no results, and the reviews were great for this scrub. This scrub makes my skin feel great right after I use it, but I have not experienced a long lasting effect with using this product. Once this product runs out, I won't repurchase it.
customer_reviews.author: mike james

customer_reviews.title: Scam👎🏾
customer_reviews.text: This product is completely horrible, it felt like sugar being rubbed on my skin. Basically a whole scam.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t want to spend this much on an exfoliator but decided to since there are so many great reviews. I was highly disappointed. This left tiny cuts all over my legs and was not moisturizing whatsoever! It burned after using and I do not have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: James Albers

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! I HAD A SEVERE ALLERGIC REACTION FELT AS IF MY SKIN WAS BEING BURNED AND NOW ITS MY FORTH DAY WITH RED BLISTER LIKE BUMPS ALL OVER MY BODY 😔
customer_reviews.author: Keanna

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT, PLEASE DO NOT SWALLOW OR USE OR SENSITIVE AREA'S - GENITAL'S
customer_reviews.text: this product is from the devil .. I have only seen bad effect's from this product. it is highly toxic & dangerous if swallowed also please heed advice and do not use on sensitive skin area's !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beowulf

customer_reviews.title: Great product, maybe overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makes my skin feel! I have even used it on my face. I just squirt a little face soap in my hand and then add a little of this and scrub my face gently and it works wonders! The only reason I gave it fewer stars was due to the fact that when I received my tub, it was all broken up into clumps and looked very dried out. It did not look like a fresh container. In addition to that, the tub is not even, almost as if it melted a little bit or something! For the price, I would have just expected a little bit better look upon arrival!
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to wash my face after seeing some reviews about it being great. I actually liked it on my face but my skin is really sensitive and it just didn’t work since I broke out. However, I fell in love with the mild scent and super lightweight oils. Excellent product and I’ll continue using but not on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Krissi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! For a women I’ve always had dry/rougher skin and let me tell you this product does wonders! In just one use I could tell it got off a layer of dead skin and my hands and skin were so smooth! It even helps me with razor burn! This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gets really bad, painful bumps after she shaves. I was talking to a friend and she suggested this product. We've tried everything else, so I thought what the heck. My daughter has been using it as a pre-scrub before shaving. She didn't see an immediate improvement, but after using it for a few days, she is now seeing results. She said that every day the bumps are less and less. She is really thrilled that we finally found something to help with the shave bumps. It's definitely worth a try, especially if you're having shaving issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kari & Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This scrub is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the scrub it looked and felt a little dry, but there are plenty of natural oils in the scrub. You dont need to use a lot. Just wet your hands and face before you use the scrub and a quarter size amount will be enough. I love this scrub. It leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. It's just the right amount of oil for my skin. My face isn't oily after use. I my skin has been glowing. My skin can be very dry at times, but also will become very oily to over compensate the dryness. This srub helps correct that. I will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaG

customer_reviews.title: Came already open?
customer_reviews.text: Came completely opened! Could not have been through packaging so no idea why?
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Moran

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Heyooo!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this scrub! I had read the other reviews and thought I’d give it a try but didn’t know I was going to get hooked! I use this scrub almost every day. It’s rough enough that you feel you’re getting the dry skin yet super moisturizing and my skin is so soft! I normally have to use oil after the shower but with this my skin is moisturized enough that most days I don’t need to oil up after the shower. I will be ordering this And using it from here on out, it’s a staple in my shower routine now! The smell is light, just enough grapefruit smell, it’s refreshing And awaking.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: i think i got a knock off
customer_reviews.text: i literally haven’t noticed a thing different in my skin after using this. maybe i’m not rubbing the salt around correctly ? ha it’s def not moisturizing or good at taking a little skin bumps off. also don’t do what I did and shave then use this that was pretty dumb because it burnt really bad. lesson learned. i’ll keep using it and see if anything happens and i’ll update my review if something has changed. but yeah wouldn’t buy again especially for the price. my god just use your own table salt. literally ZERO difference
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Dry but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for exfoliation but, damn it was dry. Even when it arrived in he box, you could shake it and it sounded like a tambourine. I had to add my own coconut oil to it to get it just right. There isn’t really an overwhelming scent to it, so that’s good. The only negative, was the dryness. Without the added oil my skin just got irritated on first use. With the added oil it was moisturizing and a little more gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: You need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised by this product! It is gentle enough to not feel like it is literally scratching my skin but it does a better job than any scrub I have ever used. When I read the reviews of people using it on their face I was very skeptical and said “I won’t use it for that” well I did and it was AMAZING. Not only is this the most effective scrub I have ever used, it does not leave me with a nasty oily residue. I have been struggling with back and shoulder acne for years and after one use I can tell a difference. I will definitely keep this
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Best product for my oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a week now and My skin looks and feels so much better than it did before I started using this product. I have very oily skin and after using this product I no longer have to use anything else for my oily skin. I love love this product. Will definitely buy it again it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: rza2et

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on the number of positive reviews. It does a good job at exfoliating. Compared to other Himalayan Salt Scrubs, it's rather expensive. I don't know if that is due to the collagen and stem cell ingredients. I use it after I shower and it has helped shed some unwanted skin. I am being offered a free jar of this product in exchange for a review. I was going to give it 5 stars all along, despite the freebie. If it wasn't working for me, I wouldn't bother using it.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Like new skin!
customer_reviews.text: Please try this product for yourself. The reviews are correct. The only thing that I didn’t like at first was the smell but it grows on you I guess. If I could describe it I would say it smells like the sea. If you use it every other day it may not last long. I recommend applying with hand first then Exfoliate with a brush or cloth. The moment you wash it off you will feel the difference, baby skin:) So the question, will I buy again? Not sure. It’s a little to expensive for me and even though I exfoliate skin once a week, but it is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for removing dead skin and the scrubbing really gets the blood flowing to the surface of the skin which makes for healthier skin. After rinsing, my face was very soft, especially when following up with a moisturizer. Use gently on your lips for softer, more supple lips! As a bonus, I usually get a red rashy breakout (bacterial infection?) in the crease of my nose/cheek and have to have an antibiotic to get rid of it. After just one use, my rash is almost gone!
customer_reviews.author: knlmix

customer_reviews.title: Best scrub I've found yet
customer_reviews.text: I dont normally use scrubs or anything but this one I'm in love with. I have been using it for about a month now and it keeps my legs feeling nice and soft. And my eczema at bay, its rough enough to take the excess skin off without damaging my sensitive skin. I follow it up with intensive moisturizer and it's the best thing I've found so far.
customer_reviews.author: Northcoastbarbie

customer_reviews.title: Smells Devine and exfoliates!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is so invigorating. It smells so citrusy and fresh. It's a gentle scrub, not as gritty as others I've tried, but it works. I used a back brush and rubbed it all over, even on the bottoms of my feet. Exfoliates wonderfully and leaves you smooth. And as I mentioned, the scent is wonderful. Great for rough elbows too!
customer_reviews.author: joshandles

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Best scrub I’ve ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve lost a lot of weight this year, and am in my mid 40s. I could see very slight dimpling and wanted to nip that in the bud. I’m so happy with the results, I’ll always have this on hand. I bought this because I was intrigued with stem cells and lychee scent. The scent is so light, I couldn’t really identify it. But the salt is the finest I’ve ever used, and I’m a skin care product addict! I’ve used everything and made my own. This is hands down the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lexxi James

customer_reviews.title: Great besides a broken safety seal
customer_reviews.text: I would normally give this product a 5 star review (based on the product itself); however, the review also reflects many other things. I am giving it a lowe4 rating based on the condition that the product came in. The seal was broken and much of the salt scrub was in the top of the container and also spilled. Quality control is what brought my rating down.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not an ordinary Scrub! You will really like it
customer_reviews.text: Not an ordinary Scrub! You will really like it. I thought this would be another regular, run-of-the-mill scrub, but how I was wrong! I have been using it on my face and neck every night for the past week and I was pleasantly surprised!! After the Scrub, the Lychee Oils nicely and richly moisturize the face, I do not even feel the need to put on my nightly moisturizer after using the Premium Himalayan Scrub. I have combination, menopausal facial skin, and this product is doing wonders clearing up topical imperfections and dryness. I love it and may be a lifetime customer. Thank you so much for this product M3 Naturals!
customer_reviews.author: Zainab Noori

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing very well!!
customer_reviews.text: It feels supple right after using it and retains until morning, then it could become dry based on weather and humidity. Overall it's a good product though need to check efficacy after month or so. The scrub is much coarse than I thought, and not fine enough like other microdermabrasion scrubs like Derma E
customer_reviews.author: Ryan N

customer_reviews.title: Not your typical scrub... so much better!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best scrub I’ve ever used and is now a part of my bath routine! Pros - the smell is amazing, the scrub is coarse even to remove dead skin and lotion buildup but gentle enough to use on your neck. It will not dry out your skin. Cons - I wish they had a tub size or a larger size. Great uses besides as a body scrub. You can use it as a body soak, you can put it in your foot spa when giving yourself a pedi. It will revitalize your aching feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nic B

customer_reviews.title: I broke out even more!
customer_reviews.text: I got this seeing that some people said it helps with their acne. I get bacne and I have looked at many different options in hopes of getting rid of it. I felt like this product was way too oily and leaves a film of moisture on the skin. Probably better for someone who does not have reactive skin. It is moisturizing so I recommend for someone who has drier skin, but someone who is acne prone or oily, I do not think this is the best product.
customer_reviews.author: lhj6

customer_reviews.title: Works Extremely Well!
customer_reviews.text: Love love loveeee this scrub!! I use it once a week to get rid of all the excess dead skin and I always notice an immediate difference. Skin feels so much smoother and so much healthier plus it leaves behind a nice scent as well. Would definitely suggest to also moisturize when you dry off from the shower if you have naturally very dry skin like myself but other than that can’t say enough good things about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Baughman

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this; in fact I’ve had it for a week and didn’t use it right away. I think I was not ready to be disappointed again and so soon! So many salt scrubs out there and they all say the same thing. However!!!! I am so pleased and happy to share that this is a keeper. Another product for life for me. This one, you can feel it does the job while it’s doing the job! It leaves a clean feel, no slippery-oily feel, non-drying, no strong scent. I felt like I was deliberately doing something deliberate to deliberately take care of my skin. Felt nice, and luxuriously clean. —- (Annette)
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product for the first time today. I have never tried an exfoliating product before so I wasn't sure what to expect. After using this product my skin was as soft as a baby’s bottom! Very impressed. I read a lot of reviews about the product having a nice scent- don’t know what thats about. Smelling the product out of the jar, has a stale smell. But I didn’t notice the smell while using / after using product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Self-Care Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I have read about how this product is helpful for your body and wanted to try it. I am trying to improve my self-care routine. I received this yesterday and tried it out. There is not a strong scent at all and my skin felt so soft afterward. I have sensitive skin and easily react to different things depending on what is in the item but no reactions here. Looking forward to more self-care with this body scrub!
customer_reviews.author: Holiday Cheer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scrub
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is moisturizing and soothing to the skin. It is one of the best body scrubs I've used and it contains natural ingredients without the added chemicals that can be detrimental. It is a product I'll continue to use several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Paticakes

customer_reviews.title: Blackhead Eraser!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly can’t even put it in words. This stuff is amazing, it’s like nothing I’ve ever used. The way your skin feels after - it’s amazing. Just amazing stuff. They have me hooked, I’m a customer for life straight up. I have really large pores/backheads. Nose, cheeks, forehead. Basically the “T” zone. This is the ONLY thing I have found that actually helps me and clears out my pores other than actually extracting with blackhead extracting tools. BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: John Lange

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: The texture reminded me of kinetic sand. The scent isn’t terrible, but not my favorite. Obviously as a salt scrub it smelled like salt and not much else. I prefer the oilier scrubs just because my skin is so dry, plus I live in the desert. This isn’t it. I may add a little of my own jojoba oil or something and possibly a couple drops of essential oil. After all this, I will say that my skin was super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: DesertMama12

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BODY SCRUB!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft and smooth my skin feels after showering with the Himalayan Salt body scrub. My skin is actually glowing and I only need a small amount of lotion on my arms and legs. As a Black women soon to be 68, this product actually works on my skin type. If you are experiencing dry skin and it's not due to a medical condition, dry this body scrub. Your skin will thank you. Thank you M3Naturals!
customer_reviews.author: E. Greene

customer_reviews.title: It feels amazing..
customer_reviews.text: This scrub leaves my skin feeling velvety smooth, but my arms and thighs have those little annoying bumps and I have already noticed a difference. My face always had red blotching around my nose, chin and in between my eyebrows- this stuff seems to have neutralized my face and has given it an even tone! I am very impressed with this stuff and will continue to buy this as my exfoliating product. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Mommarae

customer_reviews.title: Drastically improved my flaking face!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely a MUST HAVE for us now. Absolutely LOVE what it does for our skin! This product has done a great job at removing dead skin from my face without irritation while at the same time moisturizing. Wow. I am impressed. If you’re struggling with not just dry but even flaky skin then give this a try. Why shouldn’t you? No harsh chemicals and it actually works. Once you try this and realize how well it works, do an honest review to help the next person. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Tremaine

customer_reviews.title: Impressive salt scrub- buy it made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, impressive stuff and thank you to the many product reviewers who included pictures. I thought when I received this is not like the picture of what was ordered. I use it in the shower from head to toes with a filtered shower head.....impressive! Price seems a little high but factoring in shipping and made in USA not going to complain. I look and feel even more youthful! :)
customer_reviews.author: DLightful Living Young

customer_reviews.title: Great scrubber and moisturizer:)
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect that this scrub will leave my skin so smooth and moisturized after first use. I like it and it's in my routine to use it every day. It leaves a mild fragrance also. I use this on my face twice a week and on my body every day. Good to take out dead skin and put a nice thin shield of oil. Which works good for me as I don't need to put any other moisturizer on me after that:)
customer_reviews.author: BestCritic

customer_reviews.title: The incredible Himalayan Scrub
customer_reviews.text: I am truly enjoying the scent and the effects this product is having on my hands. I work with my hands everyday doing yard work, and at the end of the day my hands fell like sand paper. I don’t like shaking hands because of the rough feeling they give. 2 days have pass and they are nowhere near where I would love for them to be, but they’re look and smell much better. Still not ready for hand shaking yet.
customer_reviews.author: bibleman

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Himalayan salt scrub! I have sensitive skin as well as allergies and recently developed pretty bad dermatitis on my legs; this was the only thing that worked to help clear it up. I was using cortisone creams and taking allergy meds, and nothing would clear up the rash until I used this scrub. It does sting a little, especially if you have any open wounds, a scratch, cut, or just shaved, but it’s bearable and worth it. It will leave your skin feeling smooth and well-moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is the best one yet that i have purchase. does not have any real scent & definitely not a bad one. The scrub leaves my akin feel smooth instantly. i use it all over and especially love the results I got with my ashy elbows and knees. Of course it is salt, so if you use it on your face, you are going to taste it lol. But i do notice a nice improvement on my face, its smoother, firmer, and less open pores with every use.
customer_reviews.author: Monie

product_meta.title: M3 Naturals Himalayan Salt Scrub Infused with Collagen and Stem Cell Natural Exfoliating Body Souffle Face for Acne Cellulite Dead Skin Scars Wrinkles Cleansing Exfoliator 12 oz
feature_bullets: THE PREMIUM HIMALAYAN SALT SCRUB – Our all-natural Himalayan pink salt body and face scrub with lychee fruit and sweet almond oil provides the ultimate oil and impurities cleanse for your skin
INFUSED WITH COLLAGEN & STEM CELL providing a boost in natural collagen while increasing skin cell longevity. Together these deliver an anti-aging performance you’ve come to expect from M3 Naturals
SKIN BLEMISHES – Our unique blend of ingredients can help to reduce the appearance of acne, blackheads, cellulite, stretch marks, and scars! *
DETOXIFY YOUR SKIN by drawing out unwanted toxins, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from your pores and balancing systemic pH. A great pore minimizer that restores your silky-smooth skin!
MADE IN USA: M3 Naturals is proud to provide you with natural cruelty-free products made right here in the United States of America.
